Package ohos.net

Class DataFlowStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.net.DataFlowStatistics

  • public class DataFlowStatistics
extends Object
    Obtains traffic statistics.

    This class provides interfaces to query overall traffic statistics and traffic statistics of the specified cellular network, application, and NIC.

    Since:
    2

      • getUidRxBytes

        public static long getUidRxBytes​(int uid)
        Queries the data traffic (including all TCP and UDP data packets) received by a specified application. This method applies only to system applications and your own applications.
        Parameters:
        uid - Indicates the process ID of the application.
        Returns:
        Returns the data traffic received by the specified application.
        Since:
        2
